languages.text: "Я встречал сотни таких, как ты, торговка. Капля власти, и вот уже ваши амбиции зашкаливают, а там и до нарушения Лекса недалеко. Не зарывайся — я слежу за тобой".
languages.translation_comment:
Recruited Jae.
Jae: "Who would have thought that the lowly Jae Heydari would become part of the Rogue Trader's retinue? The Exalted One is truly generous!"

traits.locale_text: "Я встречал сотни таких, как ты, торговка. Капля власти, и вот уже ваши амбиции зашкаливают, а там и до нарушения Лекса недалеко. Не зарывайся — я слежу за тобой".

languages.text: "I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."
languages.translation_comment:
Recruited Jae.
Jae: "Who would have thought that the lowly Jae Heydari would become part of the Rogue Trader's retinue? The Exalted One is truly generous!"
languages.original_text: "Я встречал сотни таких, как ты, торговка. Капля власти, и вот уже ваши амбиции зашкаливают, а там и до нарушения Лекса недалеко. Не зарывайся — я слежу за тобой".

traits.locale_text: "I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."
"I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."

"I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."

languages.text: 「お前のような商人風情には、これまで何百人と会ってきた。少しでも力を手にすれば、すぐに野心を暴走させて、レックスに違反する。調子に乗るなよ。お前を見張っているからな」
languages.original_text: "I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のような商人風情には、これまで何百人と会ってきた。少しでも力を手にすれば、すぐに野心を暴走させて、レックスに違反する。調子に乗るなよ。お前を見張っているからな」

languages.text: "Ich bin schon Hunderten wie Euch begegnet, Schmugglerin. Sobald Ihr ein kleines bisschen Macht erlangt, gehen Eure Ambitionen mit Euch durch, bis Ihr gegen das Lex verstoßt. Treibt es nicht zu weit, ich behalte Euch im Auge."
languages.original_text: "I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin schon Hunderten wie Euch begegnet, Schmugglerin. Sobald Ihr ein kleines bisschen Macht erlangt, gehen Eure Ambitionen mit Euch durch, bis Ihr gegen das Lex verstoßt. Treibt es nicht zu weit, ich behalte Euch im Auge."

languages.text: « J'ai rencontré des centaines de colporteurs comme vous. Dès que l'on vous donne une once de pouvoir, vos ambitions s'emballent jusqu'à vous faire enfreindre la Lex. Ne jouez pas avec le feu, je vous tiens à l'œil. »
languages.original_text: "I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai rencontré des centaines de colporteurs comme vous. Dès que l'on vous donne une once de pouvoir, vos ambitions s'emballent jusqu'à vous faire enfreindre la Lex. Ne jouez pas avec le feu, je vous tiens à l'œil. »

languages.text: «He conocido a cientos como usted, buhonera. Consigue el más mínimo poder y todas sus ambiciones se desbocan hasta que termina quebrantando la Lex. No tiente a la suerte, que la estoy vigilando».
languages.original_text: "I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."

traits.locale_text: «He conocido a cientos como usted, buhonera. Consigue el más mínimo poder y todas sus ambiciones se desbocan hasta que termina quebrantando la Lex. No tiente a la suerte, que la estoy vigilando».

languages.text: “像你这样的人，我至少见过几百号，小贩。只要给你们一点点权力，你们的野心就会疯狂膨胀，直到违反了律法为止。别得寸进尺，我在盯着你呢。”
languages.original_text: "I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."

traits.locale_text: “像你这样的人，我至少见过几百号，小贩。只要给你们一点点权力，你们的野心就会疯狂膨胀，直到违反了律法为止。别得寸进尺，我在盯着你呢。”

languages.text: "Senin gibileri iyi bilirim. Güç elinize geçti mi hırsınızın kölesi olur, Lex'i bile tanımazsınız. Şansını zorlama, gözüm üzerinde."
languages.original_text: "I have met hundreds like you, peddler. You obtain any power at all — and your ambitions run wild until you are in violation of the Lex. Don't push your luck — I am watching you."
